channel.title: Survivor Game on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Survivor Game on Juan Orozco

item.title: Dune Awakening
item.description: Normally, I'm not attracted to games with grinding. After a time, it begins to feel like work. Yet, I have logged over 100 hours into this game and I enjoy most of it. I even pulled my kid into it and we sometimes go on raids together.
